start.name: You
sentences: (Gasping, eyes snap open, a raw noise) The accident! The screech of the tires... the headlights! It was real! It really happened to me!

lyra_tears.name: Lyra
sentences: (Wakes abruptly, relief washing over her face) Oh my god! You're awake! Someone get the nurseâ€”quickly!

slight_smile.name: You
sentences: (Looking at Lyra, reaching out) Lyra... I remember almost everything. I remember you sitting here, sketching, praying I'd open my eyes...

lyra_sorry.name: Lyra
sentences: (Holds MC's hand tight, tears starting) I never left. I promised I wouldn't.

echo_said.name: Echo
sentences: (Whisper, Narrative Text, audible only to MC) You forgave them long ago. I am the forgiveness you kept.

touching_face.name: Companion
sentences: (A furrowed brow, a persistent ache of failure) But there's a hole. A final, crucial piece is missing. I can't quite grasp... what was just before the final darkness.

sfx.name: Lyra
sentences: (Slight hesitation, then firmly) It doesn't matter, my love. That piece is gone. You're here. We'll face whatever is next, together. But the forgetting is over.

whole_now.name: You
sentences: (Quiet acceptance of the loss) I'll face it. I'll live with the ghost of that missing truth.
